mapper.insert: insert into file_test ( FILESEQ, ORIGINALFILENAME, STOREDFILENAME, FILESIZE, UPLOADDATE, DELETED, EMAIL, BCODE, storedPath, thumbStoredFileName, thumbStoredPath, originalfileseq ) values( #{fileSeq}, #{originalFileName}, #{storedFileName}, #{fileSize}, sysdate, #{deleted}, #{email}, 1, #{storedPath}, #{thumbStoredFileName}, #{thumbStoredPath}, #{originalFileSeq} )
mapper.select: select * from file_test where bcode = #{bcode} and deleted != 1 order by originalFileSeq desc
